alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Huron County through 615 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pigeon, or near Sebewaing, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pigeon and Elkton around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pinnebog, Ivanhoe, Port Crescent State Park, Filion and Bay Port. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
